title: Help Identify Font
content: Can anyone tell me what font bellow is. Thank you!
author: fayala70

comments.content:
Certainly. It is called

"Stitched with white thread on a red cloth"

Try posting the question in the correct place:

[http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024010837/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")
Sorry, I'm new at this. Thank you!
